header.title: User Post Isolation
header.description: View all posts from a certain user in a topic.
header.author-notes: If this MOD has helped you, please consider donating by visiting http://www.thedavidking.com and clicking the Donate link in the footer. All donations are voluntary and will be greatly appreciated.

changelog.change: Version 1.0.0 Released and Submitted to MOD DB
Still keeping it at version 1.0.0, Re-submitted to MOD DB
[fix] a couple of backend changes recommended by MOD Team
[fix] drop down box defaults to last chosen option
[feature] added "All users" option to select box to allow user to return to normal topic view.
[fix] undefined variable throwing an error when debug is on
[fix] only posts from first page shown in isolation
[fix] install and update xmls had a replace_with instead of replace-with; see previous history entry for new stuff in this version.
[fix] usernames are no longer sorted case-sensitive

[new] on viewing a forum, click the reply count for a topic to view the users that posted in that topic and the number of replies each posted. click on a user's reply count to view that user's posts in isolation
[fix] username drop-down menu on viewtopic remains visible when only one post is shown
[fix] reduces number of queries caused by [new] feature in previous update (who posted)
